performance-related pay.translation[0].d: money that you earn for your work, which is increased if you do your work very well
performance-related pay.translation[1].d: pay that increases when your work improves or becomes more productive and goes down if the opposite happens
Performance-related pay and individual performance review has been introduced for general managers.
For teachers, the Government intends to link merit pay and promotion to an appraisal scheme.
